channel.title: Todo on Ewen's thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Todo on Ewen's thoughts

item.title: Phone app to record usage
item.description: Following an idea from there, I’d like to write a small phone app to record my daily phone usage: number of times I switch the screen on number of apps used and their usage time … Ideally I would export all of that in a CSV file, and create some R scripts to plot all this (big) data.
